allow: Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '$html = Get-Content -Raw -Encoding UTF8 ""_kv_template_smart-nav.html""; Invoke-RestMethod -Method Put -Uri ""https://webzyl.com/api/admin/template/smart-nav"" -Headers @{""X-Admin-Token""=""webzyl-admin-dev-2026""} -ContentType ""text/html; charset=utf-8"" -Body $html | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5')

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '$html = \(Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ""https://grand-royal.webzyl.com/""\).Content; if \($html -match "":root\\s*\\{\([^}]{1,2000}\)\\}""\) { $rootBlock = $matches[1]; Write-Host ""=== :root block content ==="" ; Write-Host $rootBlock; } else { Write-Host ""No :root block found""; }')

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '$html = \(Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ""https://grand-royal.webzyl.com/""\).Content; $checks = [ordered]@{}; $checks.hasHeroImgOpacity = \($html -match ""\\.hero-art img.*opacity.*0""\); $checks.hasLoadedClass = \($html -match ""\\.hero-art img\\.loaded""\); $checks.hasLoadHandler = \($html -match ""Hero Image Load Handler""\); $checks | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10')

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '$html = \(Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ""https://grand-royal.webzyl.com/""\).Content; if \($html -match ""\\.hero-art\\s+img\\s*\\{[^}]{1,500}\\}""\) { Write-Host ""Found hero-art img CSS:""; Write-Host $matches[0]; } else { Write-Host ""CSS not found""; }')

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command '$html = \(Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ""https://grand-royal.webzyl.com/""\).Content; if \($html -match "":root\\s*\\{\([^}]{1,2000}\)\\}""\) { $rootBlock = $matches[1]; Write-Host ""=== Checking CTA variables in :root ==="" ; if \($rootBlock -match ""hero-cta-primary""\) { Write-Host ""✅ Found hero-cta-primary variables""; } else { Write-Host ""❌ Missing hero-cta-primary variables""; } if \($rootBlock -match ""hero-cta-secondary""\) { Write-Host ""✅ Found hero-cta-secondary variables""; } else { Write-Host ""❌ Missing hero-cta-secondary variables""; } }')
